task.summary: DTO and DAO added, view updated
DAO synchronized, added EJB service (unimplemented), some page changes, css added but it isnt great
Poprawiony CSS, generalnie troche działa ale nie ma widoku dla klienta, BookDAO do poprawy ot criteria z getAvailableBooks
v1.0 - Library works - all functionality should work, error handling and library console styles should be done.
